attributes.additional_details:
I am writing to you because we urgently need your support in Parliament, and as a public representative, to draw attention to the excalating crisis of rhino poaching in Africa.

Pressure is needed to influence policy at the highest levels of international government in countries who turn a blind eye to the trade of rhino horn.Poaching trends and the levels of sophistication in the killing of rhino, backed by enormous resources, are very alarming and require urgent intervention.
